音乐笔记 3 : 古典与现代

October 19, 2023

3.1  |  ANTONIO VIVALDI  (1711)

Concerto in si minore per 4 violini, violoncello e basso continuo, Op. 3 № 10 / RV 580


Monica Huggett / Catherine Mackintosh / Elizabeth Wilcock / John Holloway
Academy of Ancient Music
CHRISTOPHER HOGWOOD
(St George the Martyr, Holborn, London    1980-11)


3.2  |  ANTON WEBERN  (1934)

Konzert für 9 Instrumente, Op. 24


Pierre-Laurent Aimard
Ensemble intercontemporain
PIERRE BOULEZ
(Espace de projection, Ircam, Paris    1992-10)


3.X  |  LUDWIG VAN BEETHOVEN  (1795)

Klavierkonzert № 1 C-dur, Op. 15 : I. Allegro con brio – III. Rondo


Steven Lubin
Academy of Ancient Music
CHRISTOPHER HOGWOOD
(St Barnabas Church, London    1987-06)


3.X  |  WOLFGANG AMADEUS MOZART  (1786)

Klavierkonzert № 24 c-moll, KV 491 : I. Allegro – II. Larghetto


Alfred Brendel
Academy of St Martin in the Fields
NEVILLE MARRINER
(Wembley Town Hall, London    1973-06)


3.X  |  PAUL HINDEMITH  (1925)

Kammermusik № 2, Op. 36 № 1


Ronald Brautigam
Concertgebouworkest
RICCARDO CHAILLY
(Concertgebouw, Amsterdam    1990-06)


3.X  |  ИГОРЬ СТРАВИНСКИЙ  (1938)

Concerto in E-flat major "Dumbarton Oaks"


Orpheus Chamber Orchestra
(RCA 24th Street Studios, New York    1982-04)


3.X  |  АЛЬФРЕД ШНИТКЕ  (1985)

Concerto grosso № 3


Patrik Swedrup / Tale Olsson
Stockholms Nya Kammarorkester
ЛЕВ МАРКИЗ
(Danderyds gymnasium, Danderyd    1991-05)


3.X  |  ALBAN BERG  (1935)

Violinkonzert "Dem Andenken eines Engels"


Arthur Grumiaux
Concertgebouworkest
ИГОРЬ МАРКЕВИЧ
(Concertgebouw, Amsterdam    1967-01)
